# Fabric Wide Settings

Description

{{ aac_doc }}
### Examples

```yaml
apic:
  fabric_policies:
    global_settings:
      domain_validation: 'no'
      enforce_subnet_check: 'no'
      opflex_authentication: 'yes'
      disable_remote_endpoint_learn: 'yes'
      overlapping_vlan_validation: 'yes'
      remote_leaf_direct: 'no'

```
